report.title: Jet Pills
report.author: Sanger
report.bodytext: A FOAF converted freebase Benzylpiperazine to the HCl salt and tried it. /n /n /n /n /n Trial 1: 140 mg orally /n Took in capsule. Hit me after 1.25 hours. A lot of speed with mild to medium euphoria. Peaked about 1.25 after it first hit. Fast and not-too-pleasant comedown. /n /n Trial 2: Keybones after an oral dose /n After the 140 mg oral dose came down completely, the FOAF felt tired. So the FOAF had several key bones every once in a while. While sober, snorting BZP hurts a lot. But after taking the chemical orally, the pain was reduced tremendously. /n /n Trial 3: 200-250 mg orally and them smoking powder on top of MJ. /n -doesn't taste very bad. Kinda soapy /n -noticable rush (resembles ice rush) /n -mad euphoria but feel a little stoned /n -MJ effects feel stronger and the drugs extend the lives of each other /n -feels kind of like rolling (musically) /n -Bad: pressure on chest (mildly unpleasant): fast heartbeat? pain (just can't notice it because messed up)? /n -Bad:sore throat: corrosive /n -Bad: cotton mouth (increased due to sore throat) /n /n /n What causes pressure on chest? Is it something bad?
